sentences.en: A ring of muscle, the cardiac sphincter, surrounds the esophagus at this point.
sentences.cn: 此处有一肌肉环即贲门括约肌围绕着食道.

sentences.en: Adequate doses of atropine can abolish many types of reflex vagal cardiac slowing or asystole.
sentences.cn: 适当剂量的阿托品能消除多种类型的迷走反射性心效减慢或停搏.

sentences.en: Cardiac muscle is the muscle out of which the heart is made.
sentences.cn: 心肌是构成心脏的肌肉.

sentences.en: Each cardiac cell is surrounded by a plasmamembrane.
sentences.cn: 每一心肌细胞都包有一层浆膜.

sentences.en: Epinephrine is a powerful cardiac stimulant.
sentences.cn: 肾上腺素是一种强效心脏兴奋药.

sentences.en: He died of cardiac arrest after snorting cocaine.
sentences.cn: 他死于吸食可卡因之后的心脏停搏。

sentences.en: Much of this conceptual material will become invalid as our knowledge of cardiac function advances.
sentences.cn: 这种概念性的材料中的某些内容,随着对心脏知识研究的进展而成为过时.

sentences.en: Objective: The paper inquires into a new external temporary cardiac pacing method.
sentences.cn: 摘要:目的: 本文探讨一种新的体外临时心脏起搏方法.

sentences.en: She was given artificial respiration and cardiac massage.
sentences.cn: 有人给她做了人工呼吸和心脏按压。

sentences.en: The king was suffering from cardiac weakness.
The third cardiac malposition is dextrocardia.
sentences.cn: 第三种心脏位置异常是右位心.

sentences.en: There is no effective therapy for HCM and generally for cardiac hypertrophy.
sentences.cn: HCM和心肌肥厚缺乏有效的治疗方法.

sentences.en: They managed to revive the injured driver with cardiac massage.
sentences.cn: 他们通过心脏按压使受伤的司机苏醒了过来.

sentences.en: This period of hypotension is usually associated with bradycardia, decreased pulse pressure, and decreased cardiac output.
sentences.cn: 在血压降低时期一般伴有心率减慢,脉压降低和心输出量减少.

sentences.en: We shall now consider pertinent information on recent developments in cardiac electrophysiology.
sentences.cn: 我们在下面将讨论心肌电生理学最近发展的有关资料.

words.tran_cn: [解剖]心脏的；心脏病的；（胃的）喷门

phrases.tran_cn: 心律失常；心律不整；心律紊乱
心脏外科，心外科；心脏手术
心脏性猝死；突然心脏死
